abstract: Shares of Dish and EchoStar rise after Credit Suisse analysts suggest that AT&T could offer more than $20 billion for the companies.
snippet: Shares of Dish and EchoStar rise after Credit Suisse analysts suggest that AT&T could offer more than $20 billion for the companies.
lead_paragraph: As Dish Network expands its broadband spectrum, the satellite television provider is becoming an attractive target for AT&T, according to a Credit Suisse analyst report, released on Thursday.

headline.main: Dish Network and EchoStar a Fit for AT&T, Report Says
